lead_paragraph: RANSOM--Louise Bristol, born November 23, 1921 in New York City, died peacefully in Shelburne, VT on December 10, 2015. The daughter of Lawrence and Bell Bristol of Pelham, she was predeceased by her husband, Robert C. Ransom, who died in 1986. Louise was a graduate of the Brearley School and Vassar College '42. She lived in Bronxville for 35 years and in Vermont for another 35. Following the death in 1968 of her oldest son, Mike, in Vietnam, Louise began an extensive effort to end that war and to address the many issues that followed in its wake. Louise was a doer and a leader, and she inspired others to do and lead as well. She is survived by a sister, five sons, five grandchildren, and five great-grandchildren. There will be a memorial service for Louise on April 23 at 2:00pm, at Wake Robin in Shelburne, Vermont. 1/3
